Articles.Content:
Is it possible to use a save in Universe Sandbox 2 to create a Kopernicus galaxy?

 

If so would somebody please do it?

 

I would myself but I honestly don't have the knowledge or expertise.

if its possible, i would think that anyone in the kop modding scene has neither the time nor inclination to first of all figure out how us2 saves work, much less work on porting them over to ksp...and besides, us2 texture maps are pretty low res, and would look 'meh' in ksp at best

if someone wants to do it, more power to em, and its an interesting idea...but not one terribly likely to see fruition, im afraid

Yeah i figured

and the us2 textures are pretty bad compared to ksp textures

they are however required to do two different things

On 2/18/2018 at 10:19 AM, CMSBile said:

I would myself but I honestly don't have the knowledge or expertise.

If you want to try and do this, what is stopping you? There are plenty of easy-to-follow Kopernicus tutorials on YouTube and the forums.
